channel.title: Help with shop creation
channel.description:
ok im close to finished with my shop and need help with the last lil bit iv got my npc i want the shop
spawn = 851 3084 3492 0 0 0 0 0 1
the shop
shop = 2 pking shop 1 1 5698 50 2436 500 2440 500 2442 500 392 10000 4587 100 6107 500 6109 500 108 500 6109 500
now whats the code i have to add in the client file EDIT:
} else if (NPCID == 851) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2;
where so i add this???

item.title: Help with shop creation
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You’d add that under packet 155, most probably, just search ‘case 155:’.

Read full topic
